title: Celebrities battling illnesses
text:
Caption Selena Gomez Matt Sayles / Associated Press Pop star Selena Gomez has revealed that she's battling the debilitating immune system disorder lupus. "I was diagnosed with lupus, and I've been through chemotherapy," the 23-year-old singer told Billboard magazine.
